about.workExperience: In the last two years I have mainly used React, React Native, Typescript, and NodeJs technologies in my work, where our goal has been to create an application to make the life easier for the firms. In addition, we created websites for our partner companies, which we created by using Gatsby or React.
about.title: About
about.description: I am a Smiling, Friendly, Athletic, Pet Friendly developer who is looking for challenges and opportunities for improve myself.One of the reasons why I chose the world of software development as my profession is that every day I have the opportunity to find a solution to a problem or even to create something new.

first.name: Movies / Series
first.technologies: Movies and series in all quantities.

first.name: Sport
first.technologies: One of my favorite sports since I was a kid is basketball, but I like to play or try any sports if I can.

first.name: Music
first.technologies: If I need it turns me off, If I need it spins me up, but it has always been a part of my life.

second.name: Reading / Movies / series
second.technologies: I enjoy reading books about how to get better, but sometimes the best thing is to relax with an exciting novel.

second.name: Travelling
second.technologies: It doesn't matter if it's a domestic, an abroad, a hiking or a wellness trip, we go if we can!

second.name: Friends
second.technologies: It can be traveling, hiking, eating, laser fighting and sometimes a little renovation, we are in every party.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.description: In my free time I like to try new things and spend time with my partner, our doggie or our friends.

feedbacks.title: Feedbacks
feedbacks.description: I consider feedbacks very important from people around us because this is the best way how to improve and get better.

quote.quote: Timi is a conscientious and creative member of a team. She showed great effort to complete the given tasks in time and was not afraid to ask us whenever she had a question. She found the common voice easily with everyone, so was always a cheerful member of the team.  Dividing the tasks is not easy, but she does it well by keeping in mind the other teammates skills. I think she will be a loyal and reliable junior developer you can count on.

My wife is a cheerful, kind, smart and purposeful personality who is constantly training herself and developing her skills in order to achieve her goals and solve the tasks assigned to her. She‚Äôs not afraid to renew because she knows it brought her this far.

Timi is an enthusiastic and persistent person,and I really like to work with her.She is very creative,and I like to learn from her.I can count on her if I have some issues, she cares with others when needed.she is a very good team player, and also a very good person who can learn from her mistakes and encourage herself/others to do her/their best.
